trends: There have been 3 other sightings in New Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in New Philadelphia on or around July 1st 2009
divs: sighting detailsthis event came to the attention of sd from a newspaper artical sent to him via email and then forwarded to ssd\fi to verify and follow up. the following is from phone interview with the witness. at 3:56am est the witness went to lock the front door when she looked out the door window and saw a bright light across the street,to the side of a building,up above it approximately 40-50feet,and within 500' from her house in the s.e.the object\light remained stationary and hoovering. the witness watched as it changed color from red to green to white.it would completely fade out and then reappear about every 2 minutes.the shape was unknown only the bright light could be seen.the witness became frightened and called the police.she watched the object\light for approximately 1 hour and got too tired watching and waiting for police and she went to bed.the object\light was still in the same place still in the s.e.
Summary: Bright red, green and white light that would fade out and then reappear.
